title: I fucking love Jhin. Don't you?
body:
My god everything about him is amazing, regardless of not having a gap closer, he's just amazing in terms of gameplay and animation. I love it when part of the screen goes distorted on his 4th shot.

The thing is, I'm not a fan of the High Noon skin, rito plz giv us another Jhin skin.

replies.body: You sir, know how to meme

jhin is a mess of a champ
fuck you

> [{quoted}](name=xDarkRavenx,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=3AA0wREp,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-09-21T12:58:04.265+0000)
>
> Like to get one-shotted? ;)

i love it when he runs faster than singed tbh

I love Jhin because of the attack speed/crit build he is able to snowball with. Let me ask you, do you love getting **109%** bonus **movement speed** on **AUTO?!!**. Also I am going to try **Jhin **on **Urf** tomorrow as then I can get** 200% **bonus movement speed. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

Based on the few occasions I've played Jhin and listened to the voice over (I normally listen to music) I have to say that I really appreciate the amount of effort that was put into crafting the cohesive and unique **feeling** you get when playing him. Honestly, every time I heard the "_One, two, three, four, two, two, three, four_" line I felt unsettled, as if I was allowed a peek into a cold and calculating mind. There's nothing quite like it in the game.
I love building pure movement speed ( runes, masteries, items, everything ) and just bank on those crits to make Jhin super speedy. Kite anything and everything.
I mean, the Korean build can go suck a dick but overall he's pretty satisfying to play.
